content.description: Three wires each have a constant electric current for some time interval. The amount of charge that passes through a cross section within each wire is as follows.
content.question: In Wire <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>, <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> coulomb of charge passes through a cross section during a time interval of <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> second.In Wire <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> coulomb of charge passes through a cross section during a time interval of <math alttext="4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn></math> seconds.In Wire <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math>, <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> coulombs of charge passes through a cross section during a time interval of <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> seconds.Which of the following correctly ranks the currents <math alttext="I sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, <math alttext="I sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, and <math alttext="I sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math> in wires <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>, <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, and <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, I sub 1 equals I sub 3, close parenthesis, which is greater than I sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, I sub 2 equals I sub 3, close parenthesis, which is greater than I sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="I sub 2, is greater than I sub 3, which is greater than I sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="I sub 3, is greater than open parenthesis, I sub 1 equals I sub 2, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, I sub 1 equals I sub 3, close parenthesis, which is greater than I sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
